dao

Class OrdersDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.AbstractDAO<Orders>
      • dao.OrdersDAO

  • public class OrdersDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Orders>
    Handles the queries needed to operate on the database for orders table, adding 2 extra methods needed specially for orders. It extends AbstractDAO for Orders, keeping all its features.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Stefan Ciuprina

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class dao.AbstractDAO

        type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrdersDAO(java.lang.Class<Orders> type) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteByIdOf(java.lang.String IdOf, int id)
      Deletes all elements having the id of type IdOf ("something_id") equal to id parameter.
      private void deleteFromOrderDetails(java.lang.String IdOf, int id)
      Deletes from order_details table the elements having the order_id equal to the id from the orders table where the "IdOf" field is equal to the id parameter.
      java.util.ArrayList<OrderReportEntity> getAllOrderFields()
      Creates a list of OrderReportEntity objects: the client and product name are got from their specific tables according to the id specified in the orders table, the price and date fields being got from order_details table according to the order id.

      • Methods inherited from class dao.AbstractDAO

        delete, find, find, getAllFields, getLastID, insert, update, update

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public OrdersDAO(java.lang.Class<Orders> type)
        Parameters:
        type - must always be Orders.class

    • Method Detail

      • deleteByIdOf

        public void deleteByIdOf(java.lang.String IdOf,
                         int id)
        Deletes all elements having the id of type IdOf ("something_id") equal to id parameter.

      • getAllOrderFields

        public java.util.ArrayList<OrderReportEntity> getAllOrderFields()
        Creates a list of OrderReportEntity objects: the client and product name are got from their specific tables according to the id specified in the orders table, the price and date fields being got from order_details table according to the order id.
        Returns:
        the list of OrderReportEntity objects.

      • deleteFromOrderDetails

        private void deleteFromOrderDetails(java.lang.String IdOf,
                                    int id)
        Deletes from order_details table the elements having the order_id equal to the id from the orders table where the "IdOf" field is equal to the id parameter.
